CustomField.description: Enable meeting registration approval. 0 - Automatically approve registration. 1 - Manually approve registration. 2 - No registration required. https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/reference/zoom-api/methods/#operation/meetingCreate
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable meeting registration approval. 0 - Automatically approve registration. 1 - Manually approve registration. 2 - No registration required.
CustomField.label: Zoom Registration Approval Type
